name: react-redux-hooks
description: Practicing Redux and Hooks with React

scripts.build: cd react-ui/ && npm install && npm run build
scripts.sequelize-undo-all: cd server/ && npx sequelize --env init db:migrate:undo:all
scripts.sequelize-migrate: cd server/ && npx sequelize --env init db:migrate
scripts.sequelize-seeding: cd server/ && npx sequelize-cli --env init db:seed:all
scripts.sequelize-reset-db: cd server/ && npx sequelize --env init db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize --env init db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli --env init db:seed:all
